website_summaries.verdict: Save for the strap, these Nike PG shoes are in many ways similar to the Nike PG2. It is sold at the same price, too. So, if you are satisfied with how the Nike PG2 performs, then this shoe will surely be OK for you. In fact, this considered a good precursor to the critically acclaimed Nike PG3.
pros: A lot of wearers love the streamlined look of the Nike PG 2.5
Some wearers appreciate the improvements made on these Nike basketball shoes’ cushioning system
A good number of players love that this pair of kicks from the Swoosh is supportive
The materials that these Nike shoes are made of effectively work together to ensure a comfortable ride, a number of wearers observe
This offering retains the cheap $110 price of the Nike PG2
If wearers prefer a high-top basketball shoe in the same price, they can opt for the tenth Nike Hyperdunk
cons: There is no information on the fit of this pair of Paul George basketball shoes
A few testers feel that the 2.5 is basically just the PG 2 with a strap, and it is absolutely not necessary to have this as a separate release

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not the color pictured.
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting the gray PG PlayStation shoes, then place an order. The image on the product page is very clearly a pair of white shoes. There is no place to select a different color. I have ordered these twice now and they are gray, not white like pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting and most comfortable sneaker for me.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit me like the proverbial glove. maybe not the same for everyone. I have pair of original Jordan "quilted" sneakers from the 70's I think that I wore maybe twice because his foot is too different from mine. They were great walking down the aisle of airplanes and having everyone staring at them, but nothing to compare with the comfort of these PG 2.5s. Paid exorbitant amount because they are getting rare, but could not let this pair pass.
customer_reviews.author: Ancramdale

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Son wanted a grey pair but all we could find were the white ones for sale. Ordered the white ones, called the company selling them and left my request on a voice mail. What arrived were the grey pair my son wanted. All i can say, accident or intentional, is thank you. He's as giddy as a little school girl with a new pair of shoes! The shoes look great. Tongue lights up. Son swears they fit well. Appear to be designed to hug the foot/ankle for minimal slip.
customer_reviews.author: brian garrison

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: ordered for our grandson in another state. Seems to be ok. Uses them for varsity basketball.
customer_reviews.author: SMcG

customer_reviews.title: Fit Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So, the package was very clean, there was no blow or flaw. Ok, then, the product, It was the Color I Order(Blue) , the size, and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: very good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my husband birthday gift and he like it very much. He said it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MARILOU COLVERA

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: Runs true to size, my feet is quit narrow so fits me perfect. Really nice quality, great shoe
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: sale muy costosa con el envio!It comes out very expensive with shipping!
customer_reviews.text: lo envian en cajas muy grandes! They send it in very large boxes apart from the shoes run small!
customer_reviews.author: Pedrito Visionary🇵🇦☣♾

customer_reviews.title: Great painful shoe, wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with these shoes. The look and traction is great, but due to to terrible size, construction and placement of the top islet, the shoes are painful to play in. The large metal eyelet sits right on top of my ankle bone, rubbing the skin away during most lateral movements. Even with a sock covering the ankle, the shoes are still painful. Wearing a low cut no show sock is not an option for me wearing these shoes. I wouldn't purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hello

customer_reviews.title: Worong naming on the item
customer_reviews.text: How does this item has this description.....(Golf Men's Pinstripe Stretch Dress Pant) And is a basketball shoe....😁😁😁 wonder
customer_reviews.author: DIOMEDES VARGAS HDEZ

customer_reviews.title: As it is possible that a shoe, you can ...
customer_reviews.text: As it is possible that a shoe, you can raise the price so in one stroke. That's a descosiderasion to the client, I had the money ready. To buy some of the size (8.5). And I just want to tell you that you have just lost a possible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

product_meta.title: Nike Ladies Zip Top
product_meta.description: Lace up for the game in the Nike PG 2.5 and have a secure, dynamic fit the whole way through. The PG 2.5 features the return of the signature PG forefoot strap to offer a secure fit, while the laces offer traditional lockdown. From offense to defense, these sneakers keep up with your game by offering a stable, secure fit and by using rubber in the outsole to deliver premium traction perfect for quick cuts and fast sprints.
